summary: Consume Affinity API to interact with resources like lists, list entries, organizations, and persons.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (e.g., List, List Entry, Organization, Person).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., Get, Get Many, Create, Delete).

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the list object to be retrieved.

parameters.name: returnAll
parameters.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of results to return (between 1 and 10).

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the list whose list entries are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the entity (person, organization, or opportunity) to add to this list.

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Additional fields to include when creating a list entry.
